text: Tim Watts is a short film maker and caricaturist on TV's Spitting Image. Watts won the BAFTA award with longtime collaborator, David Stoten in 1994 for The Big Story. BAFTA Awards In addition he was nominated for an Academy Award for The Big Story at the 67th Academy Awards.
